title: Post isa query
content:
Am i right to assume that no classes will be conducted after isa 2 for all sems and we directly have to appear for the esa.
And we were given some extra classes where we had to sit in a room for few hrs and sign a sheet for attendance in sem 1. Will thatbbe done for every sem?

comments.body: Yup, every semester is structured the same.
No classes will be conducted after ISA 2, Unless u have attendance shortage, in that case u have to come to college.
